website_summaries.verdict: Despite its 1080p native resolution, the BenQ MH630 is definitively a data projector, with near-excellent quality for data images, but somewhat lower quality for video.
pros: High resolution suitable for detailed images

customer_reviews.title: Extremely lightly used - overheating issues already
customer_reviews.text: The projector was very lightly used. After about 200 hours on the lamp, and a month past the 1 year warranty date, the projector shuts off randomly due to overheating at 70F ambient temperatures. There's no visible dust buildup on or inside the unit. This seems to be a very common problem for BenQ projectors - do your research before purchasing, I'll certainly be veering away from their products going forward!
customer_reviews.author: prasanth ramanand

customer_reviews.title: Overheats... ZERO support from benQ
customer_reviews.text: So, if you want a projector that will work just fine for about a year (200 lamp hours) and then start overheating and shutting down after 20 mins with ZERO support from manufacturer, then this is the projector from you. New bulb - same thing. Tried reaching out to BenQ, like yelling into the wind. Seriously, look up BenQoverheating then try to find support from BenQ. I’ll drop another $800 on a projector but you bet your bottom dollar it won’t be a BenQ.
customer_reviews.author: ABH

customer_reviews.title: Great company and projector!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a refurbished projector almost three years ago 11/2015. It over heated. The company sent me another one. It also over heated. They replaced that one also. At no cost to me. I haven’t had any other problems. The picture is incredible. I understand machine can have defects. But as long as a company stands behind their product, I can deal with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome projector for work or home
customer_reviews.text: This is a baller projector, like straight up Gumby gold like bbbbbaaaaaaaaaaammm. I've used this through the HDMI port as well as the VGA + 3.5mm audio hookup and I love it. Videos are crystal clear and full HD, on board speakers are capable for conference calls and meetings, and set up is a breeze. This is crazy nice and a good deal for the price believe it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Currently having a 110' theater at home thanks to this projector!
customer_reviews.text: Good Projector for a Home Theater I am sure there are better ones out there but for the price, this is very decent, If you use it during the day with the windows open, it would sometimes be hard to see darker scenes, but a ceiling light does not prevent comfortable viewing experience. Only negative things about is sometimes its fan noise is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Firetrot

customer_reviews.title: Still Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I use this in family parties or movie nithgs or games casually,... every time I use it is by 4 or 5 hours and at this moment any issue with it. very happy to bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Franz Chamorro

customer_reviews.title: and I'm really happy with this one
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around for a projector for a long time, and I'm really happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: Four Years and Counting!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bright picture. Consistent use (about every other day). Works just as well as the day I purchased. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gadebusch

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Great Projector. We've not tried the 3D part just yet and not to sure we will either. It's very bright and easy to set up, it is however very picky about where it's placed side to side. I had to move my original mount to the left about 8 " and looking at the image I could have probably gone 6 instead. That's what I mean, the previous projector was not that picky side to side, there was enough adjustments to get it square on the screen. The picture is nice a crisp, great detail. As long as you get it centered you're in for a great show.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: ... than a year and it is beginning to have poor projection.
customer_reviews.text: Had the product less than a year and it is beginning to have poor projection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector. I am a projector fanatic. I have had a few over the years. I placed this projector on a coffee table 6 feet from the wall I wanted to project onto and the screen was crystal clear at a 100 inches diagonally. I use this projector as a replacement for a TV. I did a ton of research but noticed no reviews but one on Amazon. It does take a moment to turn on. But, beyond that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Projector!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I decided to buy this instead of a TV and it is SO FUN! (We've had tons movie nights already.) It's not as sharp as your typical HD TV, but the projection is huge. The quality has been, so far, fantastic. Portable, decently small, great value. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hinrichsen

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture. Sound quality not so good, but nice to have. 1080p image is very good. Nice and bright
customer_reviews.author: ORD-SFO

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just bad luck
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, but immediately had to return due to very loud "whining or squealing" noise. Amazon was fantastic about the return!
customer_reviews.author: Springtime

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had purchased a projector sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a month and it makes me realize I should have always bought Projectors, however - being a gamer and using Apple TV I'm wondering if I'll be replacing the bulb (which I'm not sure if it will be expensive or not to replace) soon. One caveat is the lack of HDMI ports - only has (1) but it's versatile elsewhere and if I really need more HDMI's I could buy an external port. My PS4 and Apple TV work seamlessly - I've had 4 people tell me they want a projector now.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Vidal

customer_reviews.title: Great projector! It just shoots up high even with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great projector! It just shoots up high even with the keystone adjustment you will either have to sit it on a low table or mount it upside down.
customer_reviews.author: paul allen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way too big and bulky for business use but nice display.
customer_reviews.author: Loc Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect. Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Looks amazing. I have mine set at 12' diagonally. I've have my cable box, ps4, and my computer connected to it. You will need a switch box but that's cheap. My HD channels on my cable come in clear and crisp. I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Boston

customer_reviews.title: Look No Further!
customer_reviews.text: I use this projector for occasional outdoor movie night for guests and friends at my B&B, and it works flawlessly everytime. Easy to use and easy to store. I show music videos and movies via I-pad, I-pod, cellphone, notebook and DVD, Picture is bright and crisp, I would give it 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Snead

customer_reviews.title: Great for movies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for watching movies only. The shipment to India was great by Amazon and the extra packing provided supports a lot. This PJ is easy to setup. I watched so far about 10 movies and they are great. The movies are smooth for watching. 1080p and 3000 lumens provides great brightness and clarity. I didn't see any rainbow effect in this pj so far. My expectations are fulfilled with this pj for watching movies only.
customer_reviews.author: Gunasekar

customer_reviews.title: Great projector with a great support behind it
customer_reviews.text: We've had this projector for about 8 months and the color wheel has just gone out for the second time. That said, I'm still giving it four stars because Benq has been awesome at support. Fixed it the first time quickly and sending me a replacement this time. I'd bet this one is just a fluke with something wrong with it else there would be many more reports of this and I couldn't find any. I'd recommend this projector and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: it overheats/but.....
customer_reviews.text: one of the best out there but it overheats......if you know how to work the remote it will tell you why....mostly it is the front fan...which cost 10 dollars....and there you go...its ashame that is the problems with this model....but 9 out of 10 thats the problem....the exhaust fan......
customer_reviews.author: fernandus lewis

product_meta.title: BenQ MH630 1.4A 1080P 3000 Lumens 3D Ready Projector with HDMI
product_meta.description: BenQ MH630, 1080P 3000 Lumens 3D ready projector with HDMI 1.4A

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars47 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
